languages.text: "Отсутствие манер не красит Вольного Торговца. Однако вы — {mf|хозяин|хозяйка} корабля, а я лишь смиренная гостья, что подчиняется вашим правилам".

traits.locale_text: "Отсутствие манер не красит Вольного Торговца. Однако вы — {mf|хозяин|хозяйка} корабля, а я лишь смиренная гостья, что подчиняется вашим правилам".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."
languages.original_text: "Отсутствие манер не красит Вольного Торговца. Однако вы — {mf|хозяин|хозяйка} корабля, а я лишь смиренная гостья, что подчиняется вашим правилам".

traits.locale_text: "The lack of manners is unbecoming to a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The lack of manners is unbecoming to a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这种缺乏礼貌的行为，并不符合行商浪人的身份。但无论如何，你都是这艘船的主人，而我只是谦卑的客人，按照你的规矩行事。”
languages.original_text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."

traits.locale_text: “这种缺乏礼貌的行为，并不符合行商浪人的身份。但无论如何，你都是这艘船的主人，而我只是谦卑的客人，按照你的规矩行事。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Esta falta de modales es indigna de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, esta es su nave y yo no soy más que una invitada que debe acatar sus reglas».
languages.original_text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."

traits.locale_text: «Esta falta de modales es indigna de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, esta es su nave y yo no soy más que una invitada que debe acatar sus reglas».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この礼儀のなってなさは、自由開拓者にふさわしいものではないでしょう。{name}様はこの船の主であり、あたくしは{name}様のルールを守る謙虚な客人にすぎません」
languages.original_text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."

traits.locale_text: 「この礼儀のなってなさは、自由開拓者にふさわしいものではないでしょう。{name}様はこの船の主であり、あたくしは{name}様のルールを守る謙虚な客人にすぎません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Dieser Mangel an Manieren ist unziemlich für {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}. Dennoch untersteht Euch dieses Schiff, und ich bin nur ein bescheidener Gast, der sich an Eure Regeln hält."
languages.original_text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Mangel an Manieren ist unziemlich für {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}. Dennoch untersteht Euch dieses Schiff, und ich bin nur ein bescheidener Gast, der sich an Eure Regeln hält."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce manque d'égard ne sied vraiment pas à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Cela dit, vous restez {mf|maître|maîtresse} de ce vaisseau, et moi, votre simple invitée qui doit se plier à vos règles. »
languages.original_text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."

traits.locale_text: « Ce manque d'égard ne sied vraiment pas à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Cela dit, vous restez {mf|maître|maîtresse} de ce vaisseau, et moi, votre simple invitée qui doit se plier à vos règles. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Böylesi nahoş tavırlar içinde olmak bir Hür Tacir'e yakışmıyor ama nihayetinde sen bu geminin efendisisin, bense senin koyduğun kurallara uyan naçiz bir konuktan başka bir şey değilim."
languages.original_text: "This lack of manners is unbecoming of a Rogue Trader. And yet you are the master of this ship, and I am but a humble guest who abides by your rules."

traits.locale_text: "Böylesi nahoş tavırlar içinde olmak bir Hür Tacir'e yakışmıyor ama nihayetinde sen bu geminin efendisisin, bense senin koyduğun kurallara uyan naçiz bir konuktan başka bir şey değilim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
